name: White Peach Purée
recipeIngredient: 1 pound of frozen white peaches or 4 fresh white peaches

recipeInstructions.text: Place the fruit in a blender or food processor. Add the water. Add the simple syrup. Blend until the mixture is super smooth. Taste the purée. If you need to, add a touch more simple syrup until the purée is properly sweet.
